content.rendered:
Aptos is a cutting-edge Layer 1 blockchain platform designed to enhance scalability, security, and decentralization. Unlike Layer 2 solutions that build on top of existing blockchains, Aptos operates independently with its own infrastructure. Aptos runs on the Move programming language, initially developed for Diem (formerly Libra), which provides a secure framework for smart contracts. By utilizing parallel execution through its Block-STM engine, Aptos achieves high throughput and low latency. Although Aptos has its roots in Facebook’s blockchain project Diem, with a team of former Diem developers, it now operates independently from Meta.

Below, you’ll find a list of innovative tokenless projects within the Aptos ecosystem. Engage with them early to increase your chances of qualifying for future airdrops.
